column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Lou Malnati's has been my favorite Chicago style pizza for years. I am not a huge fan of deep dish pizza and compared to others I've had
column2: Lou Malnati's deep dish is just the right thickness for my liking. The sauce has great flavor
column3: and I personally love the slight crunch on the crust. I think their prices are fair and their service is excellent. They cut and serve your pizza to you by the slice
column4: and package up any leftovers you want to take home for you
column5: too. I'll be dreaming of the next time I get to eat at the iconic Chicago pizzeria!
